title: NFL Free Agent Market Is On Fire
teaser: This year's NFL free agent market is unprecedented, according to analysts. Major players are moving and they're getting huge contracts.
contentencoded:
This year’s NFL free agent market is unprecedented, according to analysts. Major players are moving and they’re getting huge contracts.

Among the big moves: Pro Bowl defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh signed a $114 million contract with the Miami Dolphins. That makes him the highest-paid defensive player in NFL history.

Why is this happening this year? Here & Now’s Robin Young checks in with our sports analyst, Mike Pesca.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
